translation.en: [man] Dear Office of Admissions,
translation.zh: 亲爱的招生办公室…

translation.en: my name is Brooks Rattigan,
translation.zh: 我名叫布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: but I don't just want you to know that,
translation.zh: 我不只想要你知道

translation.en: I want the world to know that,
translation.zh: 我想让全世界都知道

translation.en: because I wanna change the world.
translation.zh: 因为我想要改变世界

translation.en: Like my heroes before me,
translation.zh: 就像我的英雄前辈们

translation.en: Jobs, Jordan,
translation.zh: 乔布斯、乔丹…

translation.en: Musk, game changers.
translation.zh: 马斯克、游戏规则改变者…

translation.en: World changers.
translation.zh: 世界改变者…

translation.en: These are big lives,
translation.zh: 他们的生命非常伟大

translation.en: glamorous lives.
translation.zh: 非常有影响力

translation.en: My dad lived a pretty big life.
translation.zh: 我爸以前的生活也很有影响力

translation.en: Now he...
translation.zh: 但现在…

translation.en: doesn't.
translation.zh: 不是那样了

translation.en: You can't change the world alone.
translation.zh: 一个人是无法改变世界的

translation.en: Every Jobs needs a Watts, every Jordan has a Pippen,
translation.zh: 每个乔布斯都需要一个沃茨 每个乔丹背后都有一个皮蓬

translation.en: every Musk has...
translation.zh: 每个马斯克背后…

translation.en: Well, actually I think
translation.zh: 我觉得

translation.en: Musk will probably end up on Mars by himself.
translation.zh: 马斯克会一个人飞到火星

translation.en: I've got Murph.
translation.zh: 我背后有墨菲

translation.en: [chuckles] The reviews are in.
translation.zh: 网评出来了

translation.en: -And? -Someone wrote...
translation.zh: -怎么说？ -有人说…

translation.en: Oh, "This app made me poke my eyes out, thanks for nothing."
translation.zh: “这个软件把我眼睛都刺瞎了 真是没用”

translation.en: But someone else wrote, "Groovy app," so...
translation.zh: 但还有人说“绝妙的软件” 所以…

translation.en: I guess it's net neutral.
translation.zh: 我觉得网评完全是中性的

translation.en: -It's good that they're not all bad. -True.
translation.zh: -不全是差评 这是件好事 -是的

translation.en: On to the next one.
translation.zh: 可以做下一个了

translation.en: [Brooks] Another crucial lesson I've learned from my heroes and from Murph,
translation.zh: 我从墨菲和我的英雄们学到的 另一个重要的教训是

translation.en: "Always be improving."
translation.zh: “要不断提高自己”

translation.en: I invoke this lesson daily in my current profession...
translation.zh: 我每天这样激励自己 我目前的职位是

translation.en: purveyor of the culinary arts.
translation.zh: 烹饪艺术供应者

translation.en: Without vision, we succumb to the average, and what I want is the extraordinary
translation.zh: 如果没有目标 我们只能甘居平凡 而我想要的是不平凡

translation.en: and the support of an extraordinary unive--
translation.zh: 有一个不平凡的大学的支持…

translation.en: Okay. That's enough.
translation.zh: 好了 别说了

translation.en: -But there's actually five more pages. -That's plenty.
translation.zh: -但还有五页呢 -够了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So what do you think?
translation.zh: 你怎么想？

translation.en: I think...
translation.zh: 我觉得…

translation.en: I think all the words were there.
translation.zh: 我觉得你能说的都说了

translation.en: You hate it.
translation.zh: 你不喜欢

translation.en: I bare my soul on these pages and you hate my soul.
translation.zh: 我把我的灵魂写进去了 你不喜欢我的灵魂

translation.en: You didn't bare your soul. That's what I hate about it.
translation.zh: 你没有把你的灵魂体现出来 这是我不喜欢的

translation.en: -Say more about that. -You wanna change the world?
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -你想改变世界？

translation.en: What about it?
translation.zh: 那又怎样？

translation.en: The world needs changing and I'm sure that you can agree with that.
translation.zh: 这世界需要改变 我相信你可以赞同这一点

translation.en: You talk about creating the next big thing. What thing?
translation.zh: 你说你要创造大发明 什么发明？

translation.en: And you wanna be a game-changer.
translation.zh: 你想成为一个游戏规则改变者？

translation.en: What is the game?
translation.zh: 游戏规则是什么？

translation.en: You're really going full-blown Shark Tank on me,
translation.zh: 你这是要难倒我啊

translation.en: and I have to say that I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 我非常感谢这一点

translation.en: -Yale's the goal, correct? -Yes, more than anything in the world.
translation.zh: -你想进耶鲁大学 是吗？ -是的 我做梦都想

translation.en: You have the grades.
translation.zh: 你成绩够好了

translation.en: Thank you for noticing.
translation.zh: 谢谢你注意到

translation.en: They're not just looking for good grades.
translation.zh: 他们要的不仅是成绩好

translation.en: If you wanna stand out, you're gonna have to rework your essay.
translation.zh: 如果你想脱颖而出 你得重写你的文章

translation.en: You're gonna have to look real deep inside
translation.zh: 你要好好地认识你自己

translation.en: and ask yourself,
translation.zh: 并问你自己

translation.en: "Who is Brooks Rattigan?"
translation.zh: “布鲁克斯·拉蒂根到底是谁？”

translation.en: [man] Wanna take it for a spin, Rattigan?
translation.zh: 想试驾一下吗 拉蒂根？

translation.en: -Uh, yeah, sure. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -好啊 -想吗？

translation.en: No. No!
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Hey, he's home.
translation.zh: 嘿 你回来了

translation.en: Good thing I got a second box here.
translation.zh: 正好我这里还有一盒

translation.en: No, I think I'm just gonna grab something from work.
translation.zh: 不用了 我去店里吃

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. No, no, no. Don't go.
translation.zh: 等等 别走

translation.en: I feel like we don't talk anymore.
translation.zh: 我感觉我们不说话了

translation.en: Really? I feel like that's pretty much all we do.
translation.zh: 是吗？我觉得那是我们唯一做的事

translation.en: You met with the counselor today, right? How did that go?
translation.zh: 你今天见了辅导员 对吗？ 你们聊得怎么样？

translation.en: It was good. She told me that Yale's competitive. Did you know that?
translation.zh: 挺好的 她告诉我耶鲁的竞争很激烈 你知道吗？

translation.en: I thought we agreed on UCONN?
translation.zh: 不是说好你上康涅狄格大学吗？

translation.en: Faculty scions only pay room and board.
translation.zh: 教工子女只需要付住宿的钱

translation.en: Dad, I told you not to worry about the money.
translation.zh: 爸 我和你说过 不要担心钱的问题

translation.en: Okay, you're right. Why am I worried about money?
translation.zh: 你说得对 我干嘛要担心钱？ 大学是免费的 不是吗？

translation.en: College is free, right?
translation.zh: 我干嘛要担心钱？ 大学是免费的 不是吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna figure it out.
translation.zh: 我会想办法的

translation.en: [sighs] I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不明白…

translation.en: It's a great school.
translation.zh: 康大个很好的学校

translation.en: UCONN is like the girl down the street who eats food in bed and smells like it.
translation.zh: 爸 康大就像我们街上的那个女孩 在床上吃东西 身上都是食物的味道

translation.en: -Patty Munchwrath? -I love Patty, she's fantastic,
translation.zh: -吃货佩蒂？ -我喜欢佩蒂 她很棒

translation.en: but she's not Yale.
translation.zh: 但她不是耶鲁

translation.en: Yale...
translation.zh: 耶鲁…

translation.en: She is...
translation.zh: 她就像一个

translation.en: she's smart,
translation.zh: 聪明的女孩

translation.en: she's stylish, but not flashy.
translation.zh: 她虽然有型 但不耀眼

translation.en: She's cultured, she speaks multiple languages, probably knows how to sail.
translation.zh: 她有文化 会说多种语言 可能还会驾驶帆船

translation.en: You get accepted by her,
translation.zh: 如果你被她接受了…

translation.en: that means you're somebody special.
translation.zh: 那就意味着你是一个特别的人

translation.en: Murph, do you wanna write my admissions essay for me?
translation.zh: 墨菲 你想帮我写申请学校的文章吗？

translation.en: We could do it like a thought exercise.
translation.zh: 可以是你的一个思维练习

translation.en: I'm good, cos I'm writing mine, because people write their own.
translation.zh: 不要 我有我自己的要写 应该是各人写各人的

translation.en: Give me some inspiration. What's your core theme?
translation.zh: 给我点启发 你的主题是什么？

translation.en: I'm writing about my struggles with dyslexia,
translation.zh: 我在写我的读写障碍…

translation.en: and I'm writing it backwards.
translation.zh: 我是倒过来写的

translation.en: That's genius.
translation.zh: 你真聪明

translation.en: -Do you wanna hear what I got? -Mm.
translation.zh: 你想听听我写了什么吗？

translation.en: "My name is Brooks Rattigan."
translation.zh: “我名叫布鲁克斯·拉蒂根”

translation.en: I like it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: It's raw.
translation.zh: 很直接

translation.en: Honest.
translation.zh: 很真诚

translation.en: I don't know, man, I think my life's interesting.
translation.zh: 我觉得我的生活挺有意思的 我只是不知道怎么…

translation.en: I just don't know how to articulate it, you know?
translation.zh: 我觉得我的生活挺有意思的 我只是不知道怎么… 去表达它 你懂吗？

translation.en: Why don't you write about your mom leaving?
translation.zh: 你为什么不写你妈妈的离开呢？

translation.en: -That's interesting. -That's a really short essay, actually.
translation.zh: -会很有意思 -这篇文章不适合长篇大论

translation.en: Dad got bucked off the publishing horse instead of getting back on it,
translation.zh: 我爸被出版社炒了 他本来可以要回工作

translation.en: and chasing after his cowgirl,
translation.zh: 找回我妈 但他觉得…

translation.en: he decided that sitting in the mud was good enough for him.
translation.zh: 他宁可什么都不做

translation.en: Yeah, but she left you too.
translation.zh: 但她也离开了你

translation.en: No, I think in truth she left this town, and I can't hold that against her.
translation.zh: 我觉得事实是她离开了这个镇… 我不能怪她

translation.en: Nothing is good enough for you.
translation.zh: 对你来说什么都不够好

translation.en: I think I can respect that.
translation.zh: 我可以理解

translation.en: [man] My aunt and uncle keep begging me, and it's like I'm not gonna say, "No."
translation.zh: …我的叔叔婶婶不停地求我 我不能拒绝他们

translation.en: You say, "No," because she's family and dating your cousin is weird.
translation.zh: 正因为她是你家人 你才要拒绝 和你表妹约会很奇怪的

translation.en: Dude, I'm not dating my cousin,
translation.zh: 我不是和我表妹约会 我只是陪她

translation.en: I'm escorting her to a semi-formal like Greenwich Prep, that's it.
translation.zh: 我不是和我表妹约会 我只是陪她 去格林威治学校舞会 没别的

translation.en: Plus my uncle is paying me too, so...
translation.zh: 加上我叔叔会给我钱的…

translation.en: What up, Rattigan? Italian sub on wheat, no tomatoes.
translation.zh: 嘿 拉蒂根 来一个意式三明治 小麦面包 不加番茄

translation.en: Italian sub for the Italian guy.
translation.zh: 意式三明治给意大利人

translation.en: I'm Swedish.
translation.zh: 我是瑞典人

translation.en: No, yeah, I know,
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: just no self-respecting Italian would turn his back on the tomato.
translation.zh: 有自尊的意大利人不会拒绝番茄

translation.en: Word.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: Anyway, I mean, dude, it's like the worst timing ever too.
translation.zh: 我说这真不是时候

translation.en: Like, Maddison's parents are gonna be gone
translation.zh: 麦迪森的父母当天晚上不在家

translation.en: for the night and we'd have the house to ourselves.
translation.zh: 整个房子都是我们的

translation.en: Is your cousin hot? I'll take her if she's hot.
translation.zh: 你表妹漂亮吗？如果她漂亮我就陪她

translation.en: I'll take your cousin.
translation.zh: 我送你表妹去

translation.en: -What? -Yeah, what?
translation.zh: -什么？ -是啊 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, what?
translation.zh: 是啊 什么？

translation.en: -I'll take your cousin to the dance. -Oh, yeah, sandwich boy?
translation.zh: -我送你表妹去舞会 -是吗 三明治男孩？

translation.en: Yeah? You gonna be wearing those plastic gloves too?
translation.zh: 你会戴着那副塑料手套去吗？

translation.en: Cos my aunt would love that.
translation.zh: 我婶婶会非常喜欢的

translation.en: No, this is Greenwich, so I would dress the part.
translation.zh: 不会 这是去格林威治 我会穿得像样的

translation.en: -Why? What would you get out of it? -I get the payment you're talking about.
translation.zh: -为什么？这样对你有什么好？ -我可以拿到你刚才说的那笔钱…

translation.en: -And I get to take your car. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 加上我可以开你的车

translation.en: No, you're not taking my car.
translation.zh: 不 我的车不给你开

translation.en: Come on, man, you're gonna tell me that you really wanna give up the chance
translation.zh: 别这样 你真想放弃 麦迪森父母不在时

translation.en: of spending an entire night all alone with Maddison when her parents are out of town?
translation.zh: 和她单独过一晚的机会？

translation.en: You got a suit?
translation.zh: 你有西装吗？

translation.en: Woo! I cannot believe he said yes, Murph. This is incredible!
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信他同意了 墨菲 这太不可思议了

translation.en: It's just a car.
translation.zh: -只是辆车而已 -你一点也不懂欣赏生活中

translation.en: You have no appreciation for the finer things in life.
translation.zh: -只是辆车而已 -你一点也不懂欣赏生活中 -美好的事物 -说到我不欣赏的事物

translation.en: Speaking of things
translation.zh: -美好的事物 -说到我不欣赏的事物

translation.en: I don't have appreciation for, remind me again,
translation.zh: 再和我说一遍

translation.en: why you agreed to do this? Because I need the money.
translation.zh: -你为什么要同意这样做？ -因为我需要钱

translation.en: Who knows, maybe stepping outside of myself,
translation.zh: 谁知道 或许做些和平时不一样的事

translation.en: becoming someone else for the night, it might help me finish my essay.
translation.zh: 今晚变成另一个人或许可以帮助我 完成我的论文

translation.en: And who are you gonna become?
translation.zh: 你要变成谁？

translation.en: Whatever she wants me to be, which I'm pretty sure is
translation.zh: 她想我变成谁我就是谁

translation.en: what every other girl wants me to be.
translation.zh: 应该是每个女孩都想我成为的人

translation.en: Some knight in shining armor,
translation.zh: 一个穿着盔甲的骑士

translation.en: some Prince Charming to open doors for her and compliment her hair.
translation.zh: 一个帮她开门 赞美她的头发的白马王子

translation.en: You're getting paid to take a girl on a date.
translation.zh: 你在靠和女孩约会赚钱？

translation.en: So, did you know that Michelle Obama got paid to go on a date with Barack
translation.zh: 那又怎么样？你知道奥巴马和他 妻子以前也有过付费约会吗？

translation.en: -and look how great that turned out. -Is that true?
translation.zh: -看看他们现在结果多好 -是真的吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not a presidential historian, but it could be true,
translation.zh: 我不知道 我又不是总统历史学家 但这有可能是真的

translation.en: and that is my point.
translation.zh: 这也是我想说的

translation.en: -Hello, sir. Brooks Rattigan. -Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh: -你好 我是布鲁克斯·拉蒂根 -布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: Reece told us all about you.
translation.zh: 你的事里斯都和我们说了

translation.en: Just your name, but that's all I needed to run the background check.
translation.zh: 只要你的名字 我做背景调查只需要那么多

translation.en: No, I actually know that you ran a background check.
translation.zh: 我知道你做了背景调查

translation.en: -I found out when I ran one on you. -[guffaws]
translation.zh: 是我在调查你的背景时发现的

translation.en: -Jerry Lieberman. Come in, Brooks. -Sure.
translation.zh: -我叫杰瑞·利伯曼 请进 布鲁克斯 -好的

translation.en: Before you have a chance to change your mind.
translation.zh: 趁你还没改变主意

translation.en: I'm kidding.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的

translation.en: I like to joke about things.
translation.zh: 我喜欢开玩笑

translation.en: -So, welcome to our humble abode. -[young woman] This is stupid!
translation.zh: -欢迎光临寒舍 -这真蠢

translation.en: -As you can see, all original flooring. -[young woman] Get out!
translation.zh: -你可以看到 都是原装地板 -出去！

translation.en: I swear, Jerry, the wrinkles that girl has caused me
translation.zh: 天哪 杰瑞 那丫头让我

translation.en: in places I didn't even know could wrinkle.
translation.zh: 皱纹一天比一天多

translation.en: Honey, our guest has arrived.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们的客人到了

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: Lillian Lieberman.
translation.zh: 莉莉安·利伯曼

translation.en: She won't wear the shoes.
translation.zh: 她不肯穿那双鞋

translation.en: There are no "the shoes," there's just shoes. Is she wearing shoes?
translation.zh: 别管她穿哪双了 只要是双鞋 她穿鞋了吗？

translation.en: [Jerry] It's a miracle she agreed to do this.
translation.zh: 她能答应这么做真是奇迹

translation.en: Good evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: -I am-- -Reece's bitch?
translation.zh: -我是… -里斯的走狗？

translation.en: -Celia! -Relax, he knows I'm kidding.
translation.zh: -西利亚！ -别紧张 他知道我在开玩笑

translation.en: Right, slum?
translation.zh: 是吧 伙计？

translation.en: Oh, sweetie, you look so beautiful.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的 你真美

translation.en: I'm not wearing the shoes.
translation.zh: 我不穿那双鞋

translation.en: -But they go. -Listen to yourself.
translation.zh: -但那双鞋很配 -听听你自己

translation.en: Well, I happen to think that heels are an outmoded display of
translation.zh: 我觉得高跟鞋是一个过时的…

translation.en: female oppression.
translation.zh: 女性被压迫的体现

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Thanks, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢了 妈

translation.en: Let's do this, so we can stop doing this.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 这样可以早点结束

translation.en: [Jerry] You kids have fun.
translation.zh: 祝你们玩得开心

translation.en: -Thanks for the assist back there. -Yeah, no, just part of the job.
translation.zh: -刚才谢谢你帮我 -没事 只是工作的一部分

translation.en: Reece let you use his car.
translation.zh: 里斯让你用他的车

translation.en: Man, he was really desperate to get out of this, wasn't he?
translation.zh: 他真是非常不想带我 是吧？

translation.en: No, he wanted to go with you. He thought we would have more fun together.
translation.zh: 不 他想和你一起去 他只是觉得我们在一起会更有意思

translation.en: There you are.
translation.zh: 请

translation.en: Oh, that's cute,
translation.zh: 哦 真可爱…

translation.en: but I can open my own doors.
translation.zh: 但我会自己开门

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Shall I put on some music?
translation.zh: 要我放点音乐吗？

translation.en: Wow, you provide quite the service.
translation.zh: 哇 你的服务真到位

translation.en: Don't tell me you've got individually wrapped Mentos
translation.zh: 你的手套箱里不会有 单独包装的薄荷糖

translation.en: and Tyler water bottles in your glove box.
translation.zh: 和矿泉水吧

translation.en: Oh, my God, you do.
translation.zh: 天哪 真的有

translation.en: Fulfilling my fantasy of dating my Lyft driver.
translation.zh: 和我出租车司机约会的幻想成真了

translation.en: [GPS] In 500 feet, make a left.
translation.zh: 150米后 左转

translation.en: No, you're gonna keep on the straight.
translation.zh: 不 你要直走

translation.en: -The navigation said-- -No, don't listen to robots, listen to me.
translation.zh: -导航说… -别听机器人的 听我的

translation.en: [GPS] Recalculating. In 200 feet, make a right.
translation.zh: 重新计算 60米后 右转

translation.en: You need to make a left here.
translation.zh: 这里左转

translation.en: Okay, so now pull over,
translation.zh: 好 靠边停…

translation.en: and here we are.
translation.zh: 我们到了

translation.en: This is not your high school.
translation.zh: 这不是你的学习

translation.en: Wouldn't it be weird if it was?
translation.zh: 如果是就怪了

translation.en: Okay, so you can swing back and pick me up in a few hours.
translation.zh: 好 你可以过几个小时后来接我

translation.en: You're telling me that you would rather hang out at a...

translation.zh: （情侣网球比赛 接受 拒绝）

translation.en: Suck it, Bill and Claire!
translation.zh: 接招吧 比尔 克莱尔！

translation.en: So, sports, right?
translation.zh: 体育 对吗？

translation.en: Isn't it interesting how many there are?
translation.zh: 有那么多种体育 真有趣

translation.en: And how some use balls and some... don't?
translation.zh: 有些用球 有些不用

translation.en: And pucks. There's pucks.
translation.zh: 还有冰球

translation.en: Okay, I'm terrible at this.
translation.zh: 我一点都不行

translation.en: I should just never go on a real date, ever.
translation.zh: 我不该真的和别人约会

translation.en: No, no, no, no, you're doing great.
translation.zh: 不 你做得很好

translation.en: This is one small step for man.
translation.zh: 一个人迈出的一小步

translation.en: Talk about what you want to talk about, not what you think I want to talk about.
translation.zh: 说你想说的 而不是说你认为我想谈论的

translation.en: Yeah, okay, that makes sense.
translation.zh: 好 我能理解

translation.en: So, what do you want to talk about?
translation.zh: 你想聊些什么？

translation.en: Um, well, this morning I did see a very large man walking a very tiny dog.
translation.zh: 今天早晨我看到了一个很胖的人 在遛一条很小的狗

translation.en: Oh, my God, I...
translation.zh: 天哪 我…

translation.en: -I love it when that happens. -Me too.
translation.zh: -我最喜欢看到那些事了 -我也是

translation.en: -[message tone] -[beep]
translation.zh: （萨尔萨舞蹈 接受 拒绝）

translation.en: Howdy.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hola.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: （成功之路…）

translation.en: Brooks. Look, I'm not good at apologies,
translation.zh: -我是布鲁克斯 -我不擅长道歉

translation.en: but I feel I owe you one, because you're a gentleman
translation.zh: 但我觉得我该给你道歉 因为你是位绅士

translation.en: and pretty fun to be around.
translation.zh: 你很有趣 你只是在工作

translation.en: You were just doing your job, but you were pretty smug too,
translation.zh: 你很有趣 你只是在工作 但说实话 你也挺自以为是的

translation.en: so it shouldn't be a whole apology, but a half apology,
translation.zh: 所以我觉得不该给你一个完整的道歉 半个道歉差不多

translation.en: so I'm half sorry, is that cool?
translation.zh: 我一半对不起 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sorry, who's this?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你是哪位？

translation.en: Oh, Jeez, sorry, it's Celia. So do you accept my half apology or not?
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 不好意思 我是西利亚 你接不接受我的一半道歉？

translation.en: Well, you are half forgiven, but fully admired for the effort.
translation.zh: 我一半原谅你 但完全欣赏你做出的努力

translation.en: Well, good,
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: because I'm in desperate need of your services.
translation.zh: 因为我急需你的服务

translation.en: Oh, God, what's your mom making you go to this time?
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 你妈妈这次又要让你参加什么？

translation.en: Is it a débutante ball? Ice cream social? Wait, let me guess.
translation.zh: 初学者舞会？冰淇淋聚会？ 再让我猜猜

translation.en: Is it a horse auction?
translation.zh: 马匹拍卖会吗？

translation.en: Aha. No, yeah, that's pretty accurate.
translation.zh: 是的 猜的真准

translation.en: No, there's this boy I like, Franklin.
translation.zh: 不 有一个我喜欢的男孩 弗兰克林

translation.en: Hold on, Celia,
translation.zh: 等等 西利亚

translation.en: you have a crush?
translation.zh: 你有喜欢的人了？

translation.en: Is that so hard to believe?
translation.zh: 很难相信吗？

translation.en: Yes, it is. That's why you're hearing disbelief in my tone.
translation.zh: 是的 这就是为什么从我的语气中 你能听到怀疑

translation.en: Just because I'm a little weird, doesn't make me less human,
translation.zh: 虽然我有点奇怪 但这不代表我缺乏人性

translation.en: in fact, it makes me more human.
translation.zh: 相反 这让我更具有人性

translation.en: So, there's this party at Shelby's house tonight--
translation.zh: 今天晚上在谢尔比家有个派对…

translation.en: Yes. Oh, my God, yes.
translation.zh: 好 太好了

translation.en: -A hundred times, yes. -Whoa, reel it in there, cowboy.
translation.zh: 真是好消息 -别那么着急 -我是说…

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: -别那么着急 -我是说…

translation.en: I barely wanna go.
translation.zh: 我… 不怎么想去

translation.en: Yeah, so I'm thinking, listen, we show up as a hot couple,
translation.zh: 我想我们可以扮做一对情侣出席

translation.en: get Franklin a little jealous,
translation.zh: 让弗兰克林吃醋

translation.en: maybe you can stir up some attention from Shelby.
translation.zh: 也许你也可以引起谢尔比的注意

translation.en: So, pick me up at seven.
translation.zh: 七点来接我

translation.en: It's a date.
translation.zh: 就这么定了

translation.en: And Celia, next time you require my services,
translation.zh: 对了 西利亚 下次 如果你需要我的服务

translation.en: could you use my app?
translation.zh: 你可以用我的软件吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God, you didn't?
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 不是真的吧？

translation.en: Oh, but I did.
translation.zh: 哦… 是真的

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, this is way more than a mints and tiny bottles of water.
translation.zh: 这已经不只是薄荷糖和矿泉水了

translation.en: This is a full-on bespoke concierge service. Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -这是一个完整定制的礼宾服务 -是的 女士

translation.en: Okay, so what's the weirdest Brooks Rattigan you've been thus far?
translation.zh: 你目前当过的最奇怪的 布鲁克斯·拉蒂根是什么？

translation.en: I had a date the other night, where I had to just sit on this girl's couch
translation.zh: 有天晚上约会 我得坐在那女孩的沙发上

translation.en: and listen to her talk for four hours straight,
translation.zh: 听她不停地说四个小时 我唯一允许说的是

translation.en: and all I was allowed to say was, "Yes, I agree,"
translation.zh: 听她不停地说四个小时 我唯一允许说的是 “是” “我同意”

translation.en: and "There's no other way to see it."
translation.zh: “你说的完全没错”

translation.en: -My God, that is the perfect date. -There's no other way to see it.
translation.zh: -天哪 那才是个完美的约会 -你说的完全没错

translation.en: Hey, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Son, a couple of things. The shifter sticks a little bit,
translation.zh: 有些事我要提醒你 变速器有点卡

translation.en: and the passenger window doesn't close all the way, so watch out for that.
translation.zh: 副驾驶窗关不紧 注意一下

translation.en: And there's a spring in the seat cushion, so do not lean all the way back.
translation.zh: 座位垫里有一个弹簧 不要向后靠到底

translation.en: Wow. What, does Bruce Wayne live here?
translation.zh: 哇 这是蝙蝠侠的房子吗？

translation.en: You know, Shelby's dad's basically Batman,
translation.zh: 如果蝙蝠侠是个没有金融法律意识的

translation.en: if Bruce Wayne was a sleazy hedge fund manager
translation.zh: 卑鄙对冲基金经理

translation.en: with a questionable sense of finance law.
translation.zh: 那谢尔比的爸爸就真的是蝙蝠侠

translation.en: You guys made it.
translation.zh: 你们来了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Uh, your place is amazing. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -你们家真棒 -谢谢你

translation.en: It really makes me reconsider the allure
translation.zh: 这让我重新考虑住在

translation.en: of living in a three-room house with a view of Target.
translation.zh: 塔吉特百货对面三室小屋的吸引力

translation.en: Oh, he's kidding, obviously. Brooks is from Darien.
translation.zh: 哦 他明显在开玩笑 布鲁克斯来自达里恩

translation.en: Oh, my God, I love it there.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 我最爱那里

translation.en: It's just so beautiful,
translation.zh: 那里简直太美丽了

translation.en: it makes this neighborhood look like a shanty town.
translation.zh: 它让这里显得像一个很简陋的小镇

translation.en: Could you excuse me for one moment?
translation.zh: 不好意思 失陪一下

translation.en: It seems the family dog escaped his room.
translation.zh: 我们家的狗跑出房间了

translation.en: Don't go anywhere.
translation.zh: 别走

translation.en: I wouldn't want to get lost.
translation.zh: 我可不想走丢

translation.en: -Dad. -What?
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Darien? Really?
translation.zh: 达里恩？不会吧？

translation.en: Hey, this is Shelby Pace we're trying to impress here.
translation.zh: 你想留下好印象的人可是 谢尔比·佩斯

translation.en: Either go big or go home, son.
translation.zh: 要么做大 要么回家

translation.en: Oh, my God, that's Franklin. Abort, let's go.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 是弗兰克林 任务取消 我们走

translation.en: This is the whole reason that we're here.
translation.zh: 等等 这是我们来这里的原因

translation.en: I know, but I just didn't expect to see him so soon,
translation.zh: 我知道 但我没有想到会这么快见到他

translation.en: I thought I'd have some time to, I don't know, like clutch my bearings.
translation.zh: 我以为我会有点时间来…准备一下

translation.en: Relax. Okay, which one is he?
translation.zh: 别紧张 哪一个是他？

translation.en: -Is he the guy in the yellow shirt? -Yes, stop being so obvious.
translation.zh: -是穿黄衬衫的那个吗？ -是的 别那么明显

translation.en: -He's cute. -Stop it.
translation.zh: -他真可爱 -别说了

translation.en: Pretend to have a conversation with me.
translation.zh: 假装和我说话

translation.en: We could also have a real conversation, that might be way less weird.
translation.zh: 我们也可以真的说话 这样会显得正常得多

translation.en: Fine, whatever, you start.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便 你开始

translation.en: Where are you planning on going to college?
translation.zh: 你打算去哪里上大学？

translation.en: Uh, University of Michigan.
translation.zh: 密歇根大学

translation.en: Wait, you're not going Ivy League? Isn't that, like, your birthright?
translation.zh: 你不打算上常春藤盟校？ -这可是你天生的权力 -拜托了 见到没？

translation.en: Please, you see this?
translation.zh: -这可是你天生的权力 -拜托了 见到没？

translation.en: This is the precise number of shits I give about the Ivy League.
translation.zh: 我对常春藤盟校的在乎程度为零

translation.en: Well, I give many more shits than that.
translation.zh: 我可是很在乎的

translation.en: You know, if you want to go talk to him,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？如果你想去和他说话

translation.en: you should just go talk to him.
translation.zh: 你应该去找他

translation.en: I know, I'm working up to it.
translation.zh: 我知道 我在准备

translation.en: -This is ridiculous, come on. -Stop it.
translation.zh: -这太可笑了 来吧 -别这样

translation.en: You're making it worse by making a scene.
translation.zh: 你制造这么大的动静 你把事情变得更糟了

translation.en: -You are such a brute. -It's one of my more likable qualities.
translation.zh: -你真是野蛮 -这是我讨人喜欢的一点

translation.en: Have you seen this collection? She is a music fiend,
translation.zh: 你见过这些收藏吗？她是个音乐狂

translation.en: always going on and on about bands.
translation.zh: 总是不停地聊乐队

translation.en: Bands that I've never heard of, so you know they're cool, right?
translation.zh: 都是我从来没有听说过的乐队 他们一定很酷

translation.en: Not in like a mainstream way cool, more like a subversive.
translation.zh: 不是主流的那种酷 更像是反传统的那种…

translation.en: Tell him.
translation.zh: 跟他讲讲

translation.en: I like music and records.
translation.zh: 我喜欢音乐… -和唱片 -我也是

translation.en: Me too. I mean, vinyl is the only pure delivery method, right?
translation.zh: -和唱片 -我也是 我是说 黑胶唱片是唯一的无损传播方式

translation.en: Yeah, I'm always saying that.
translation.zh: 是的 我也是一直在这么说

translation.en: Music should only be listened to
translation.zh: 黑胶唱片是

translation.en: on melted and then pressed vinyl discs.
translation.zh: 听音乐的唯一正确方式

translation.en: There are kids our age, they've never even heard a vinyl record before.
translation.zh: 有些我们同龄的孩子 他们从来没有听过黑胶唱片

translation.en: [Celia] They don't know what they're missing,
translation.zh: 他们不知道他们错过了什么…

translation.en: or worse,
translation.zh: 或许更糟

translation.en: they do.
translation.zh: 他们知道

translation.en: You know your girlfriend is over there talking to Franklin Volley?
translation.zh: 你知道你女朋友在那里和 弗兰克林·沃里说话吗？

translation.en: Everything is so compressed on digital, it's like drinking a frozen OJ
translation.zh: 数码音乐都被压缩过了 就像不喝鲜榨橙汁 反倒喝冰冻橙汁

translation.en: instead of a fresh-squeezed OJ.
translation.zh: 就像不喝鲜榨橙汁 反倒喝冰冻橙汁

translation.en: Yeah, it's okay, we trust each other. I'm not really the jealous type.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们彼此信任 我不吃醋

translation.en: -How refreshing. -Well, I aim to refresh.
translation.zh: -真爽快 -爽快是我的目标

translation.en: -You're funny. -Me?
translation.zh: -你真有趣 -我吗？

translation.en: Most guys I know don't realize they can be both rich and funny.
translation.zh: 我认识的大多数男生都不明白 他们可以既有钱 又有趣

translation.en: Well, you can, I'm obviously living proof.
translation.zh: 可以的 我就是证明

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: They have a separate freezer for ice cream.
translation.zh: 这里专门有一个冰箱放冰淇淋

translation.en: I was alone in the kitchen and started to applaud.
translation.zh: 我一个人在厨房里开心地拍手了

translation.en: -Mm. -So, we have Boom Chocolotta
translation.zh: 我们有爆炸巧克力味！

translation.en: and plain old vanilla. Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -还有纯香草味 -哦 谢谢

translation.en: -Really? -Yo.
translation.zh: -不会吧？ -喂

translation.en: Don't knock vanilla, okay? It's a...
translation.zh: 别鄙视香草味 它…

translation.en: It seems a little boring, I give you that,
translation.zh: 确实是有点无聊

translation.en: but there's a lot of nuance flavors hiding inside.
translation.zh: 但它里面藏有很多微妙的味道

translation.en: Kind of like you.
translation.zh: 有点像你

translation.en: -Wow, so I'm vanilla. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -哇 那我就是香草？ -是的

translation.en: Somehow you always manage to compliment and insult me at the same time.
translation.zh: 你总是同时夸我和侮辱我

translation.en: It's a hereditary gift, on my mom's side.
translation.zh: 这是遗传下来的天赋 来自我妈妈那边

translation.en: Where's Franklin?
translation.zh: 弗兰克林在哪？

translation.en: Oh, he's somewhere. I don't really wanna see that much of him.
translation.zh: 哦 他就在附近 我不想老见到他

translation.en: -What? -Before our date.
translation.zh: -什么？ -至少约会前我不想老见到他

translation.en: What? Franklin asked you out? That's great.
translation.zh: 什么？弗兰克林约你了？太棒了

translation.en: No, actually, I asked him out,
translation.zh: 不 其实是我约他的

translation.en: because I am the master of my universe, and yeah, it's pretty great.
translation.zh: 因为我是我世界的主宰 挺不错的

translation.en: Oh, separate but related, it gives us a pretty good reason for our breakup.
translation.zh: 若即若离 这给我们一个很好的分手理由

translation.en: -I see your game, you meet someone new. -Hit it and quit it, baby.
translation.zh: -我看出来了 你认识了新的人 -泡到了就甩掉 宝贝儿

translation.en: Okay, there's this huge birthday party that's supposed to happen in a few weeks,
translation.zh: 过几个星期 有一个很大的生日派对

translation.en: and everyone's gonna be there, including your girl, Shelby.
translation.zh: 所有人都会在场 包括你喜欢的那个谢尔比

translation.en: Just the breakup has to be public, like very public.
translation.zh: 只是分手一定要很公开 非常公开

translation.en: Can you imagine if I date Shelby and get into Yale?
translation.zh: 你能想象如果我和谢尔比约会 加上被耶鲁录取吗？

translation.en: I mean, that would be it, that would be my dream come true.
translation.zh: 那就是我的梦想成真

translation.en: Oh, God, I feel bad for you.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 你真可怜

translation.en: You're just relying on external factors for your happiness,
translation.zh: 你的快乐取决于外部因素

translation.en: waiting for people to accept you instead of accepting yourself.
translation.zh: 你在等着别人接受你 而不是先接受自己

translation.en: I mean, what could go wrong?
translation.zh: 我是说 能出什么纰漏？

translation.en: Isn't that exactly what you're doing with Franklin?
translation.zh: 你和弗兰克林不就是这样吗？

translation.en: -You're just jealous. -Of what?
translation.zh: -你只是嫉妒 -嫉妒什么？

translation.en: Um, my connection with Franklin. It's more cerebral.
translation.zh: 我和弗兰克林的关系… -更多是思想上的 -拜托

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: -更多是思想上的 -拜托

translation.en: Like you're not at all interested in him 'cause he's hot.
translation.zh: 你说得好像你不是因为他帅 才对他有兴趣的

translation.en: Whoa, his brain is hot, okay?
translation.zh: 他的头脑很帅 好吗？

translation.en: I can just picture his gorgeous frontal lobe.
translation.zh: 我能想象出他性感的额叶

translation.en: -Gross. -Yeah, that was unintentionally gross.
translation.zh: -真恶心 -确实 无意中的恶心

translation.en: Fine, I like him because of his brains and, you know,
translation.zh: 好吧 我喜欢他 是因为他的头脑 你知道…正巧 连在一起的那张脸也很漂亮

translation.en: the beautiful face that's attached to it.
translation.zh: 你知道…正巧 连在一起的那张脸也很漂亮

translation.en: There you go, so we're both shallow teenagers.
translation.zh: 那就对了 我们俩都是肤浅的少年

translation.en: It would appear so.
translation.zh: 好像是这样

translation.en: -You're really sweet. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你真的很贴心 -是的

translation.en: -Can I have some of that, please? -Whoa! No! No way.
translation.zh: -我可以吃点你的吗？ -哇 不行！

translation.en: [laughs] So, I might be able to help. My dad knows the president.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你 我爸爸认识校长

translation.en: -Of what country? -Of Yale.
translation.zh: -什么学校？ -耶鲁

translation.en: Um, they've been playing poker, like forever,
translation.zh: 他们从很早开始就一起打扑克

translation.en: and I guess my dad's been losing to him for ten years,
translation.zh: 我爸爸十年来一直输给他

translation.en: in case I ever wanted to go.
translation.zh: 为的是万一我想上耶鲁

translation.en: So, the fact I don't wanna go is kind of a sore point.
translation.zh: 所以我不想去是他的痛处

translation.en: I don't get it, rich people all know each other.
translation.zh: 我不明白 有钱人都互相认识 我连我的理发师都不认识

translation.en: -I don't even know who my barber is. -Okay, do you want my help or not?
translation.zh: 我不明白 有钱人都互相认识 我连我的理发师都不认识 -好吧 那你要不要我帮忙了？ -要 一百个要

translation.en: Yes. A hundred times, yes.
translation.zh: -好吧 那你要不要我帮忙了？ -要 一百个要

translation.en: Well, no promises, but I can check with him.
translation.zh: 我不能保证 但我可以问问他

translation.en: What? Are you serious? Wow.
translation.zh: 什么？你说真的吗？哇

translation.en: Thank you. All I got for you is wow.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我能说的只有…

translation.en: Well, I'm a woman of much wow.
translation.zh: -哇 -我是个充满惊喜的女人

translation.en: Hey, man, I'll give you 50 bucks for your car.
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计 我拿50块钱买你的车 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh, you think that's funny? -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -你觉得很好玩吗？ -是的

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿

translation.en: What's with the get-up?
translation.zh: 你怎么穿成这样？

translation.en: Uh, I figured if I'm going to Yale, I'd better start stepping it up.
translation.zh: 我觉得如果我要上耶鲁 我得换一种生活方式

translation.en: Hey, what's going on with all the late nights lately?
translation.zh: 嘿 你最近怎么这么晚回来？

translation.en: Uh, you know, the usual teenage stuff, school projects, dances, 24-hour raves.
translation.zh: 你懂的 青年人的事儿 学校活动 舞会 还有24小时酒宴

translation.en: Hm. Atta boy.
translation.zh: 好孩子

translation.en: Do you think you could clean up one day? I mean, it's starting to look a little...
translation.zh: 你哪天要不要收拾一下？ 这里开始看起来有点…

translation.en: condemned in here.
translation.zh: 不像样了

translation.en: I'm gonna get to it.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: I could help you, if you want.
translation.zh: 如果你想 我可以帮你

translation.en: I think I do.
translation.zh: 好呀

translation.en: And actually, you have helped.
translation.zh: 其实你已经帮过我了

translation.en: I submitted a collection of my short stories of this fellowship,
translation.zh: 我提交了我写的关于伙伴关系的 短故事集

translation.en: because you were so terribly and vividly mean to me.
translation.zh: 因为你对我非常刻薄

translation.en: So, thank you for being a supportive
translation.zh: 所以 谢谢你是一个支持我的

translation.en: asshole.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: Anytime.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: -Good night, Pops. -Good night, buddy.
translation.zh: -晚安 爸 -晚安 伙计

translation.en: Hey, look, little Brooks is almost a third of the way to his goal.
translation.zh: 看看 布鲁克斯已经差不多 在成功的道路上行进了三分之一

translation.en: If I keep getting business like this, I'm gonna be at little Yale by the summertime.
translation.zh: 如果我的生意一直这样好 我夏天就能到耶鲁了

translation.en: That's great, man. Really.
translation.zh: 真不错 真的

translation.en: What is that? What...
translation.zh: 什么意思？什么…

translation.en: You seem distant.
translation.zh: 你似乎疏远了

translation.en: Well, I guess I am.
translation.zh: 我… 我想是的

translation.en: We just usually have stuff to talk about, because we spend time together,
translation.zh: 我们平时有得聊 因为我们总在一起

translation.en: or we used to.
translation.zh: 我们曾经是这样

translation.en: So, distance is making us distant, which makes sense to me.
translation.zh: 但距离产生疏远 这很正常

translation.en: But it's fine, really. We're gonna grow apart when we go to college,
translation.zh: 但没事的 真的 我们上了大学后会分开的

translation.en: so we might as well get the process started now.
translation.zh: 不如现在就开始

translation.en: Okay, well,
translation.zh: 好吧 那…

translation.en: how about this?
translation.zh: 要不这样

translation.en: I'm totally booked out tonight and tomorrow,
translation.zh: 我今天明天晚上都有事

translation.en: but I am completely free on Saturday and I will make sure it stays that way,
translation.zh: 但我星期六没有事 我保证不安排别的事

translation.en: if you promise to go to Tino's with me.
translation.zh: 如果你保证和我一起去蒂诺的店

translation.en: Count me in.
translation.zh: 就这样定了

translation.en: Oh, hey, can we hit that new zombie-themed escape room afterwards?
translation.zh: 之后我们可以去那家新开的 僵尸主题的密室逃脱吗？

translation.en: Yes, I am in.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hello again.
translation.zh: -你好 又见面了 -你好

translation.en: -Hey, I'll take a-- -Tuna melt on seven grain.
translation.zh: -你好 又见面了 -你好 -我要… -金枪鱼谷物三明治

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -Uh, thanks. -Murph is my given name.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -墨菲 是我的名字

translation.en: Oh, I guess I gotta give you this.
translation.zh: 我得把这个给你

translation.en: I just remembered that this is when you usually come by.
translation.zh: 我记得你平时都是这个时候来

translation.en: -Yeah. -We get paid a dollar above minimum wage,
translation.zh: -是的 -我们的收入比最低工资高一块钱

translation.en: so we're encouraged to provide top service.
translation.zh: 所以我们应该提供最好的服务

translation.en: Uh, well, thanks, Murph.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢你 墨菲

translation.en: -What? -You were blushing.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -你脸红了

translation.en: Who is that? Huh?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: Hey, yo, I work at White Castle, okay? You know what that means,
translation.zh: 嘿 我在白色城堡上班 你们知道那是什么意思吗？

translation.en: I see some of the finest bitches in the world every damn day,
translation.zh: 我每天都能见到世界上最漂亮的小妞

translation.en: and, Pops, I gotta tell you with the utmost respect,
translation.zh: 还有 老爹 我必须得告诉你

translation.en: your daughter,
translation.zh: 你女儿

translation.en: she's got to be one of the finest bitches I have ever seen in my entire life,
translation.zh: 她是我这辈子见过最漂亮的小妞

translation.en: and I've been to the Westminster Dog Show, okay? All right.
translation.zh: 我去过威斯敏斯特犬类选美大会 你懂吗？

translation.en: I have to take the browns to the Super Bowl,
translation.zh: 我得去超级碗打球了

translation.en: and by that I mean I gotta take a hot deuce, right?
translation.zh: 意思是说我得拉个屎 明白了吗？

translation.en: Daddy-o, where the bathroom at?
translation.zh: 老爹 厕所在哪儿？

translation.en: It's down the hall on the left.
translation.zh: 过了走廊左拐

translation.en: I love you, baby.
translation.zh: 我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: Hey, Celia.
translation.zh: 嘿 西利亚

translation.en: What's up, Vanilla? What are you up to?
translation.zh: 你好 香草 你在干什么？

translation.en: I'm getting paid to be a douche to a girl's parents,
translation.zh: 一个女孩给我钱让我在她父母面前 装成一个混蛋

translation.en: so that they're more accepting of her real boyfriend when they actually meet him.
translation.zh: 这样他们见到她真的男朋友时 更能接受他

translation.en: Um, parents have it hard.
translation.zh: 父母真难做

translation.en: What are you doing tomorrow? Like early afternoonish?
translation.zh: 你明天下午做什么？

translation.en: What, for my best customer? I'm totally free. Why, what's up?
translation.zh: 为了我最好的客户 我没事 怎么了？

translation.en: I may have got you an interview with the Dean of Undergraduate Admissions at Yale.
translation.zh: 我给你争取了一个和耶鲁大学 本科招生主任面试的机会

translation.en: Oh, my God, Celia, I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 天哪 西利亚 我不知道该说什么了

translation.en: Well, why don't you try?
translation.zh: -那你就试着说说看 -西利亚·利伯曼

translation.en: Celia Lieberman, you make flowers blossom.
translation.zh: -那你就试着说说看 -西利亚·利伯曼 -你使世界充满鲜花

translation.en: You are the reason trees have leaves.
translation.zh: 你使树木发出枝芽…

translation.en: You are a goddess.
translation.zh: 你是个女神

translation.en: Aw! That is absolutely correct.
translation.zh: -你说的完全没错 -我什么时候来接你？

translation.en: -What time should I pick you up? -You shouldn't.
translation.zh: -你说的完全没错 -我什么时候来接你？ 你别来

translation.en: This is your day, but it's my rules, so I'm gonna pick you up at one.
translation.zh: 这是你的好日子 但要按我的规矩来 我一点钟来接你

translation.en: I'll text you my address.
translation.zh: 我把我的地址发给你

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Woo hoo! Yo, man, that number two turned to a number five real quick.
translation.zh: 天哪 拉坨屎真是费时间

translation.en: Where the plunger at?
translation.zh: 马桶搋子在哪儿？

translation.en: What? I'm trying to look smart. Do I look too smart?
translation.zh: 怎么了？我想显得精神一点 我看上去精神吗？

translation.en: It looks like someone took a J. Crew store,
translation.zh: 你看上去像是有人把男士服装店

translation.en: put it in a cannon and shot it at your face.
translation.zh: 塞进了大炮里 射到了你脸上

translation.en: Thank you, so much. I mean, what do I do?
translation.zh: 太感谢你了 我刚怎么办？

translation.en: I don't understand clothes.
translation.zh: 我对衣服不了解

translation.en: They're completely irrelevant yet somehow important.
translation.zh: 衣服和你本人无关 但同时有很重要

translation.en: Lose the glasses.
translation.zh: 摘掉眼镜

translation.en: Go on, give it to me. Okay, that's better.
translation.zh: 给我 好 好多了

translation.en: Do you need the cardigan? I'm gonna answer that. You don't need it.
translation.zh: 你要穿毛衣吗？ 我来帮你回答吧 你不用

translation.en: -I like the cardigan. -No one likes it.
translation.zh: -我喜欢这件毛衣 -没人会喜欢

translation.en: -Intellectual people wear cardigans. -You do not look intellectual.
translation.zh: -什么？知识分子穿毛衣的 -你看上去不像知识分子

translation.en: For the love of God, come on.
translation.zh: 天哪 快点

translation.en: Oh, you know, what you do need though, you need a mani.
translation.zh: 你知道你需要什么吗？你需要修指甲

translation.en: That is a fight for another day, my friend.
translation.zh: 改天吧

translation.en: Wow, who would have thought that Celia Lieberman could be so comforting?
translation.zh: 哇 谁会想到西利亚·利伯曼还会 安慰人？

translation.en: It's like underneath all these layers of angst and sarcasm,
translation.zh: 似乎在那层焦虑和讽刺底下

translation.en: there might actually be a human being.
translation.zh: 真的还有些人性

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Hey, relax.
translation.zh: 嘿 别紧张

translation.en: All you gotta do is be yourself.
translation.zh: 你只要做你自己就好了

translation.en: I mean, not this annoying, anxious version,
translation.zh: 我是说 不是这烦人、焦虑的你

translation.en: the better version.
translation.zh: 是那种更好的你

translation.en: I have been an astronaut, a cowboy and a douche, all in the past three days,
translation.zh: 最近三天我当过 太空人、牛仔 还有一个混蛋

translation.en: so I don't know which version of myself I'm supposed to be right now.
translation.zh: 我不知道现在该做哪一个

translation.en: Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: Dean's ready for you now.
translation.zh: 系主任现在见你

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -[Celia] Hey. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -嘿 -什么？

translation.en: You're gonna kill it.
translation.zh: 你能行的！

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 除非…

translation.en: unless you don't.
translation.zh: 你不行

translation.en: Mr. Rattigan, a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 拉蒂根先生 幸会

translation.en: -Take a seat. -Yes, sure.
translation.zh: -请坐 -好

translation.en: So, tell me about yourself.
translation.zh: 说说你自己

translation.en: Yeah, I'd love to.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: What says more about a person than numbers, right?
translation.zh: 数字最能说明一个人了

translation.en: So, the first time I took the SAT I got a 1510,
translation.zh: 我第一次参加SAT考试得了1510分

translation.en: and that was because I butchered the math section, but
translation.zh: 因为数学部分我没有做好

translation.en: I knuckled down, and I put work over parties,
translation.zh: 于是我加倍努力 不去参加派对 而是复习功课

translation.en: and I managed to bump it up to a 1570 on my second time around.
translation.zh: 第二次参加考试我得了1570分

translation.en: That's too bad.
translation.zh: 太糟糕了

translation.en: I'm sorry?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Well, that you missed out on parties. Parties are fun.
translation.zh: 你错过了派对 派对很有意思

translation.en: It's important to enjoy life, especially at your age.
translation.zh: 享受生活很重要 特别是在你这个年龄

translation.en: With respect, it's not exactly the message that we get from our parents and teachers.
translation.zh: 我无意冒犯 但我们家长和老师可不是这么说的

translation.en: I grant you that, yeah.
translation.zh: 你说得没错

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: Mr. Rattigan, academically speaking, you seem like the perfect candidate for Yale.
translation.zh: 拉蒂根先生 就成绩来说 你很适合上耶鲁

translation.en: Thank you, sir. Coming from you that means a lot.
translation.zh: 谢谢先生 谢谢你这么说

translation.en: But I want to know a little something about you.
translation.zh: 但我想知道关于你的一些东西

translation.en: Tell me something about yourself, activities, hobbies.
translation.zh: 说说你自己 参加什么活动？ 有什么兴趣爱好？

translation.en: Sure, well I'm in French Club, I'm a National Honors Society, and--
translation.zh: 没问题 我参加法语俱乐部 -国家荣誉学会 -不对

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: -国家荣誉学会 -不对

translation.en: No, I don't mean the things that you do,
translation.zh: 我问的不是这些

translation.en: because you think they look good on an application.
translation.zh: 这些似乎会使你的申请看起来不错

translation.en: What are some of your interests outside of school?
translation.zh: 学校之外 你有什么兴趣爱好？

translation.en: Outside of school?
translation.zh: 学校之外的？

translation.en: Example, I had a kid in here yesterday, right there,
translation.zh: 我给你举个例子 昨天一个面试的孩子

translation.en: and he breeds trash-eating microbes in his spare time.
translation.zh: 他利用业余时间繁殖吃垃圾的微生物

translation.en: It's fascinating stuff.
translation.zh: 这太棒了

translation.en: I don't... breed trash-eating microbes.
translation.zh: 我不繁殖… 吃垃圾的微生物

translation.en: I don't really breed microbes at all, but I do have hobbies,
translation.zh: 我不繁殖任何微生物 但我确实有个兴趣爱好

translation.en: and interests. I mean, so many of those.
translation.zh: 其实我的爱好很多

translation.en: There is this thing, but I think you'll find it stupid.
translation.zh: 就这个爱好来说 -也许你会觉得很傻 -不会 说说看

translation.en: No, what? What is it?
translation.zh: -也许你会觉得很傻 -不会 说说看

translation.en: Well lately, I've been getting into
translation.zh: 最近我对蜜蜂…

translation.en: honey bees.
translation.zh: 很感兴趣

translation.en: I don't...
translation.zh: 我不…

translation.en: I'm sorry,
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: did you just say, "Honey bees?"
translation.zh: 你是说蜜蜂吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a bit of an amateur beekeeper.
translation.zh: 我是个业余养蜂人

translation.en: -I know, it sounds silly. -No, it doesn't sound silly at all, to me.
translation.zh: -我知道 这听起来很傻 -对我来说 这根本不傻

translation.en: I'm a bit of an apiarist myself.
translation.zh: 我自己也对养蜜蜂感兴趣

translation.en: -No kidding. -Yes.
translation.zh: -开玩笑吧 -真的

translation.en: Wow, what a small world.
translation.zh: 哇 真是太巧了

translation.en: Tell me, what's your bee of choice? I used to be all about the Russian bees,
translation.zh: -说说 你选什么蜜蜂品种 -我以前都是选俄罗斯蜜蜂

translation.en: but then I found that their swarminess tended to be a little too--
translation.zh: 但我发现它们的集群方式有点…

translation.en: Unpredictable.
translation.zh: 难以预测

translation.en: Unpredictable, that's right. So, now I'm a Buckfast man all the way.
translation.zh: 难以预测 没错 现在我只选布克法斯特蜂

translation.en: -They have so much more foraging zeal. -Yes.
translation.zh: -它们采蜜的热情很高 -是的

translation.en: Uh, and, you know, don't get me started on their resistance to tracheal mites.
translation.zh: 说到它们对气管螨虫的抵御能力 我会停不下来

translation.en: Tracheal mites.
translation.zh: 气管螨虫

translation.en: As soon as you get that application done, you bring it into me personally, okay?
translation.zh: 你把申请写好后 拿回来交给我本人

translation.en: -Not my secretary. -I will, sir.
translation.zh: -不要给我的秘书 -好的 先生

translation.en: -Sir, call me Delbert, please. -Okay.
translation.zh: -请叫我德尔伯特 -好的

translation.en: And when you come by, don't forget to bring a jar of your honey.
translation.zh: 你来的时候别忘了带一瓶你的蜂蜜

translation.en: As long as you bring a jar of your honey,
translation.zh: 那你也给我带一瓶你的蜂蜜

translation.en: we can have ourselves a little honey swap.
translation.zh: 我们可以交换蜂蜜

translation.en: Honey swap. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 交换蜂蜜

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: It was a pleasure meeting you, Mr. Rattigan, truly.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 拉蒂根先生 真的

translation.en: The pleasure was mine, Delbert.
translation.zh: 应该是我很高兴 德尔伯特

translation.en: Thank you so much for setting this up. It went better than I could have imagined it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你帮我安排这次会面 效果比我想象中还要好

translation.en: Well, happy to help. Just...
translation.zh: 我很愿意帮你

translation.en: just one little tiny question.
translation.zh: 只是想提个问题

translation.en: Why exactly are you guys swapping honey?
translation.zh: 你们俩为什么要交换蜂蜜？

translation.en: What, is that unusual?
translation.zh: 这很不寻常吗？

translation.en: I can't believe you.
translation.zh: 我无法相信你

translation.en: What? I did some research before my interview, okay?
translation.zh: 怎么了？我只是在面试前做了些功课

translation.en: Hold on a second. What is the difference between me spouting a few beekeeping facts
translation.zh: 等一下 我杜撰一些养蜜蜂的事情

translation.en: and any of the Stand-In dates that I've been on? Huh?
translation.zh: 和我替人参加约会有什么区别？

translation.en: You know that I'm not an art historian or a douche, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我既不是艺术史学家 也不是个混蛋

translation.en: No, actually I don't know that, and this is completely different.
translation.zh: 我不知道 这完全不一样

translation.en: Those girls paid you to lie to them, and this time you did it all on your own.
translation.zh: 那些姑娘花钱听你撒谎 而这次是你自作主张

translation.en: Look, it is hustle, baby, pure hustle.
translation.zh: 这是自信 完全是自信

translation.en: Oh, God, please don't ever say that again.
translation.zh: 哦 行了 别这么说

translation.en: It did sound a little bit better coming out of Reece's mouth.
translation.zh: 里斯这么说的时候听起来好多了

translation.en: Wait, Reece? My cousin, Reece? What does he know about hustle?
translation.zh: 等等 里斯？我的表兄里斯？ 他懂什么自信？

translation.en: It's how he got his BMW.
translation.zh: 他这样弄到了一辆宝马

translation.en: Brooks, Reece got his car because his dad started having an affair
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯 里斯之所以有那辆车 是因为他爸爸

translation.en: with his sister's JV tennis coach, and his mom found out about it,
translation.zh: 和她妹妹的网球教练搞婚外恋 后来他妈妈发现了

translation.en: so she starts sleeping with the dude who owns a bunch of BMW dealerships,
translation.zh: 于是她自己开始和 宝马售车处的老板上床

translation.en: hence the BMW.
translation.zh: 这就是他宝马的由来

translation.en: -What, so no hustle? -No.
translation.zh: -什么？不是什么自信？ -不是

translation.en: You're telling me
translation.zh: 你是说…

translation.en: that Reece got a brand new BMW i8, because
translation.zh: 里斯得了一辆全新的宝马i8

translation.en: his parents are shitty people?
translation.zh: 是因为他的父母都是烂人？

translation.en: Yeah. So, maybe you should rethink who your role models are.
translation.zh: 没错 也许你该重新考虑 把谁当做你的榜样了

translation.en: -What about Shelby and Franklin? -What about Shelby and Franklin?
translation.zh: -那谢尔比和弗兰克林呢？ -谢尔比和弗兰克林怎么了？

translation.en: You don't know the first thing about vinyl, and I am certainly not from Darien.
translation.zh: 你对黑胶唱片一无所知 而我也不是来自于达里恩

translation.en: Okay? These are the lies that both of us made up to get what we want.
translation.zh: 我们撒这些谎 是为了得到我们想要的东西

translation.en: Storming off, fantastic. That's what people who're right and not hypocrites do.
translation.zh: 气冲冲地走了 太好了 假冒伪善者可不会这样做

translation.en: Speak more words and I'll hurt you.
translation.zh: 你再说 别怪我打你

translation.en: -Maybe you're right. -About which thing? There were a couple.
translation.zh: -也许你是对的 -哪件事儿是对的？

translation.en: Maybe I am a hypocrite, okay?
translation.zh: 也许我有点假冒伪善 行了吧？

translation.en: My parents say that I stomp around
translation.zh: 我父母说我咋咋呼呼

translation.en: in my boots looking tough...
translation.zh: 装作很凶的样子

translation.en: to push people away,
translation.zh: 拒人千里之外…

translation.en: because
translation.zh: 是因为…

translation.en: I'm too scared to show people who I really am.
translation.zh: 我害怕向别人展示真实的自己

translation.en: Oh, God, if anyone actually heard me saying this.
translation.zh: 天呐 谁会听我说这些？

translation.en: -Yeah, you know what I mean. -You're gonna be fine, okay?
translation.zh: -你知道我什么意思 -你会没事的

translation.en: You are Celia Lieberman.
translation.zh: 你是西利亚·利伯曼

translation.en: And being weird and confident are not mutually exclusive elements to life.
