translation.zh: 这个西利亚·利伯曼

translation.en: she's boring.
translation.zh: 她很无聊

translation.en: You wanna push me away? Go ahead, cos we're through, baby.
translation.zh: 你想把我踢开？那就来吧 我们完了

translation.en: We are done, we are--
translation.zh: 我们分手了 我们…

translation.en: How's that for a defense mechanism?
translation.zh: 这作为防御机制来说怎么样？

translation.en: God, I hate these shoes.
translation.zh: 天呐 我痛恨这种鞋子

translation.en: Celia.
translation.zh: 西利亚

translation.en: Celia! My dung beetle.
translation.zh: 西利亚 我的屎壳郎

translation.en: [Shelby] Brooks.
translation.zh: （有史以来最佳表演 我差点以为是真的 干得漂亮！） 布鲁克斯

translation.en: -Hey, are you good? -Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: -嘿 你没事吧？ -我没事

translation.en: Uh, physically I'm fine, but emotionally I'm...
translation.zh: 身体上来说我没事 但精神上…

translation.en: a wreck.
translation.zh: 我快崩溃了

translation.en: I hate to admit it, but I kind of saw this one coming.
translation.zh: 我不想承认 但我知道你们迟早会分手

translation.en: I mean, those two were being really chummy at my party.
translation.zh: 他们俩上次在我家的舞会上就很亲密

translation.en: Yeah, well I can be oblivious sometimes.
translation.zh: 是呀 有时候我会当局者迷

translation.en: Thank you for rubbing that in.
translation.zh: 谢谢你提这事儿

translation.en: -So, here's a question. -Yes, whatever it is, yes.
translation.zh: 那… -我想问你个问题 -随便什么问题 我都同意

translation.en: Will you go to formal with me?
translation.zh: 你愿意陪我参加正装舞会吗？

translation.en: I mean, do I have to speak or can you read my alarming fast heart rate? Yes.
translation.zh: 还用我说吗？从我加速的心跳 你看不出来吗？当然可以

translation.en: Hold on, you guys have another formal? How many does your school have?
translation.zh: 等一下 你们又有正装舞会了？ 你们学校有多少正装舞会？

translation.en: As many that are needed to fund the new stables.
translation.zh: 为新的马厩募集资金 需要多少就有多少

translation.en: Murph, you will never believe what happened to me. Shelby kissed me.
translation.zh: 墨菲 你一定不会相信 谢尔比亲吻了我

translation.en: Oh, dude, congrats. I always knew you could do it.
translation.zh: 祝贺你 哥们儿 我就知道你能行

translation.en: -Who's Shelby? -Toby, why are you here? Where's Murph?
translation.zh: 谁是谢尔比？ 托比 你在干嘛？墨菲呢？

translation.en: -We switched shifts. -Why? Is he sick?
translation.zh: -我和他换班了 -什么？他生病了吗？

translation.en: I don't think so, because it wasn't just for today.
translation.zh: 没有 我们不是只有今天换班

translation.en: It was for like the rest of the year.
translation.zh: 到年底前 我们都换班了

translation.en: -Did he say why? -No.
translation.zh: -他有说原因吗？ -没有

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you know what, he did say that you were a selfish prick
translation.zh: 他倒是说过 你是个自私的家伙

translation.en: and that you only think about yourself.
translation.zh: 你只顾着考虑自己

translation.en: You don't think that has anything to do with him switching shifts, do you?
translation.zh: 你不会觉得这和换班的事情有关吧？

translation.en: [woman] I guess you think this is pretty pathetic...
translation.zh: 我想你一定会觉得

translation.en: going for a walk with some old lady.
translation.zh: 陪一个老太婆散步很可悲

translation.en: No, I feel like I actually needed this.
translation.zh: 没有 我觉得这正是我需要的

translation.en: My granddaughter set this up. I don't know the first thing about apps,
translation.zh: 这都是我孙女安排的 我对手机应用一窍不通

translation.en: unless it's the Bloomin' Onion at Outback Steakhouse.
translation.zh: 我只懂内地牛排屋的炸洋葱球

translation.en: -Now that's a good app. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 那个应用不错

translation.en: My husband and I did this every day for the past 20 years.
translation.zh: 过去20年 我和我丈夫每天都这样散步

translation.en: -He passed away in June. -I'm so sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: -他在六月份去世了 -我很替你难过

translation.en: Oliver.
translation.zh: 奥利弗

translation.en: That was his name.
translation.zh: 是他的名字

translation.en: He was ugly as sin.
translation.zh: 他长得很丑

translation.en: His face was weird.
translation.zh: 他的脸好奇怪

translation.en: He had the right sized face on the wrong sized head.
translation.zh: 他头大脸小

translation.en: Ol' smushy face,
translation.zh: 我管他叫

translation.en: that's what I called him.
translation.zh: 浆糊脸

translation.en: That's real nice.
translation.zh: 真有意思

translation.en: I didn't care what he looked like.
translation.zh: 我才不管他长得好不好看

translation.en: He made me laugh, and I liked being around him.
translation.zh: 他给我带来欢笑 我喜欢在他身边

translation.en: You want to know how you can tell if you're meant to be with someone?
translation.zh: 你想知道 怎么看两个人是不是一对儿？

translation.en: -Please. -It's simple.
translation.zh: -请告诉我 -很简单

translation.en: Just sit and have a conversation.
translation.zh: 只要坐下来聊一聊

translation.en: Some people when you talk to them, it's like trying to listen to classical music
translation.zh: 跟有些人聊天 就像你捧着一个没有天线的收音机

translation.en: on a radio with no antenna.
translation.zh: 想听一段古典音乐

translation.en: You can push that dial back and forth all you want,
translation.zh: 无论你怎么调按钮

translation.en: but you only get static.
translation.zh: 你只能听到杂音

translation.en: But when you're meant to be with someone,
translation.zh: 但如果你们真的是一对儿…

translation.en: and they truly are the one,
translation.zh: 你是她的真命天子…

translation.en: you just sit,
translation.zh: 你们只要坐下

translation.en: start talking,
translation.zh: 开始聊天

translation.en: and a Beethoven sonata will begin to play.
translation.zh: 贝多芬奏鸣曲就开始响起

translation.en: You haven't mentioned the formal, Cel. It's tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 你没提正装舞会的事 西利亚 是明天晚上

translation.en: Do you get a cut of the ticket sales or something?
translation.zh: 你是没买到票 还是怎么了？

translation.en: -You are going, right? -I am actually.
translation.zh: -你要去的吧？ -是的

translation.en: -With whom? -Nobody.
translation.zh: -跟谁去？ -没谁

translation.en: I'm going whom-less.
translation.zh: 我一个人去

translation.en: What about Brooks?
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯不陪你吗？

translation.en: I thought you guys were hanging out,
translation.zh: 用你们的话说

translation.en: to use the parlance of your time.
translation.zh: 你们不是在一起玩吗？

translation.en: Dad, no. I don't want to go with anybody.
translation.zh: 不 爸爸  我不想跟谁去

translation.en: Not Brooks Rattigan, not Franklin Volley, nobody.
translation.zh: 既不要布鲁克斯·拉蒂根 也不要弗兰克林·沃里

translation.en: -Okay? -Honey, listen--
translation.zh: -行吗？ -亲爱的 听着…

translation.en: No, Mom, can you listen?
translation.zh: 妈 别说了 能听我的吗？

translation.en: I have the rest of my life to get hung up on relationships and dating,
translation.zh: 我剩下的人生要经历很多 约会和情感生活

translation.en: and "Is he really into me?", and "What does this text mean?"
translation.zh: “他喜欢我吗？” “这个信息是什么意思？”

translation.en: -And all that bullshit. -Celia.
translation.zh: -这些乱七八糟的东西 -西利亚

translation.en: Why is high school the time of your life
translation.zh: 为什么你们想要求一个高中生

translation.en: that you're expected to be good at everything?
translation.zh: 在各方面都擅长？

translation.en: I just wanna be whatever I am.
translation.zh: 我只想做我自己

translation.en: And I'm proud of that.
translation.zh: 我为此很自豪

translation.en: I just wanted you to have a better high school experience than I had.
translation.zh: 我只想你不要犯我们以前犯过的错

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: -Group hug. -No, that's good.
translation.zh: -一起抱一下 -不要了吧？

translation.en: -Group hug. -Please.
translation.zh: -一起抱一下 -拜托了

translation.en: -Yep. -Oh, do we have to? Stop.
translation.zh: -好 -非得这样吗？停

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: You look incredible.
translation.zh: 你看起来太迷人了

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: It only took three stylists, two hairdressers, one makeup artist,
translation.zh: 也只用了三个造型师、两个美发师 和一个化妆师

translation.en: Bioslimming active wrap, two hours of pilates,
translation.zh: 还有生物减肥活性包 两个小时的普拉提

translation.en: and like 12 pounds of moisturizer to look this way.
translation.zh: 差不多5公斤的润肤露 就达到了这个效果

translation.en: Wow. I took a shower.
translation.zh: 哇 我只冲了个澡

translation.en: Hold on, wait, chivalry is not dead.
translation.zh: 等下 骑士精神还没有死

translation.en: -All right. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好了 -谢谢

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不用谢

translation.en: What's that smell?
translation.zh: 你车里什么味儿？

translation.en: We ordered our tuna crudo, like, ten minutes ago.
translation.zh: 我们十分钟前就叫了生金枪鱼

translation.en: Yeah, it was a while ago.
translation.zh: 是的 有一会儿了

translation.en: So, Shelby, do you have any plans for after high school?
translation.zh: 谢尔比 毕业之后你有什么计划吗？

translation.en: I don't know, it's tough.
translation.zh: 我不知道 很难决定

translation.en: I don't, like, have my whole life planned out or anything.
translation.zh: 我还不想为我的整个人生做计划

translation.en: -Yeah, nobody does. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -是的 谁也不想 -没错

translation.en: So, in the fall, I'll be going to Columbia,
translation.zh: 秋天我会去哥伦比亚大学

translation.en: where I'll major in applied economics in management with a concentration in finance,
translation.zh: 主修管理应用经济学 我将专攻金融这一块

translation.en: and of course, I'll intern at my father's hedge fund over the summers.
translation.zh: 夏天 我会去我父亲的对冲基金公司实习

translation.en: Then, it's off to Harvard Business School, where I'll get my MBA.
translation.zh: 然后去哈佛商学院读MBA

translation.en: I'll graduate, get some seed money
translation.zh: -酷 -等我毕业了 我会拿一小笔资金

translation.en: and then open up my own private equity firm, but...
translation.zh: 开一家我自己的投资管理公司

translation.en: after that, it's all kind of up in the air.
translation.zh: 再以后就说不好了

translation.en: You really have to get your shit together, huh?
translation.zh: 看来你都计划好了

translation.en: Right, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: How about you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: -Me? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我吗？ -对呀

translation.en: Well, I'm applying to Yale,
translation.zh: 我在申请耶鲁大学…

translation.en: and then I'll...
translation.zh: 之后我会…

translation.en: Well, I've been obsessing over just
translation.zh: 这段时间… 我只顾着…

translation.en: applying for so long, that I haven't even thought about what I would do if I got in.
translation.zh: 申请大学了 我们还没想好入学后做什么

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的？

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm 18.
translation.zh: 但我才18岁

translation.en: I got time to figure out who I am and what I want to do.
translation.zh: 我有时间… 去想明白我是什么样的人 我想做什么

translation.en: You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不明白

translation.en: -Oh, no. -What?
translation.zh: -哦 不 -怎么了？

translation.en: It's your ex.
translation.zh: 你的前女友

translation.en: Is this gonna be weird for you?
translation.zh: 你会觉得不自在吗？ 我自己根本不在乎

translation.en: I mean, I personally don't care at all, but maybe you should?
translation.zh: 你会觉得不自在吗？ 我自己根本不在乎 -但也许你应该在乎 -不 没关系

translation.en: No, it's fine.
translation.zh: -但也许你应该在乎 -不 没关系

translation.en: Wow, she's a really bad dancer.
translation.zh: 哇 她舞跳得真烂

translation.en: Yeah, she's the worst.
translation.zh: 是的 她最差劲了

translation.en: So, you wanna go get a table or... ?
translation.zh: 我们要不要找桌子坐下？

translation.en: -Yeah, sure. -[woman] Brooks?
translation.zh: -好的 -布鲁克斯？

translation.en: It is you.
translation.zh: 真的是你

translation.en: Leah, hi. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 利亚 你好 你在这儿干嘛？

translation.en: I go here. Look, I just really wanted to thank you,
translation.zh: 我来参加舞会 我想来谢谢你

translation.en: you really helped me out a lot. If I hadn't used your services,
translation.zh: 你帮了我很多 要是我没有使用你提供的服务

translation.en: I wouldn't have been able to get with Larry, here.
translation.zh: 我也不会认识拉里

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Larry. -It's nice to meet you, Larry.
translation.zh: -你好 我叫拉里 -拉里 幸会

translation.en: -Do you want to get that table? -Uh...
translation.zh: 我们去找桌子坐？

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean, you used his services?
translation.zh: 等一下 你说你用他的服务是什么意思？

translation.en: -This table right here. -His Stand-In app, Brooks for hire.
translation.zh: -那边有桌子 -他的替身手机应用 雇佣布鲁克斯

translation.en: Isn't that what you're doing, Shelby?
translation.zh: 你是不是也在使用他的服务？

translation.en: Am I... am I paying somebody to go out with me?
translation.zh: 我… 花钱雇人陪我约会？

translation.en: God, no. Gross.
translation.zh: 天呐 不 这太恶心了

translation.en: -Brooks? -Yeah?
translation.zh: -布鲁克斯？ -嗯

translation.en: What the hell is going on here?
translation.zh: 这到底是怎么回事儿？

translation.en: I have a side...
translation.zh: 我有一个副业

translation.en: business, where I go on dates with girls.
translation.zh: 就是陪女孩约会

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: You're not like a male prostitute or anything, right?
translation.zh: 你不会是个男妓吧？

translation.en: Like, what is it?
translation.zh: 叫什么来着？

translation.en: A male gigolo?
translation.zh: -男性舞男 -舞男都是男的

translation.en: Well, all gigolos are males, but not all males are gigolos.
translation.zh: -男性舞男 -舞男都是男的 但不是所有男的都是舞男

translation.en: No, it's clean and innocent. I swear, it's...
translation.zh: 我的生意是干净无辜的 我保证…

translation.en: I do it because I need the money. Shelby, I'm not rich. I'm not from Darien.
translation.zh: 我这样做是因为我需要钱 谢尔比 我不富有 我不是来自达里恩

translation.en: I'm just some poor kid from Bridgeport, who wanted to impress you.
translation.zh: 我只是个来自布里奇波特的穷小子 想给你留下好印象

translation.en: I mean, look at you, you are smart,
translation.zh: 看看你 又聪明

translation.en: and strong and beautiful, and you are way too good for me.
translation.zh: 又坚强 又美丽 我配不上你

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I am too good for you,
translation.zh: 你是配不上我

translation.en: and not because I have more money than you,
translation.zh: 不是因为我比你有钱

translation.en: it's because I'm not a liar.
translation.zh: 而是因为我不撒谎

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Where is your date?
translation.zh: 你的对象呢？

translation.en: She is elsewhere.
translation.zh: 到其他地方去了

translation.en: I told her everything.
translation.zh: 我全都… 跟她说了

translation.en: Where's Franklin?
translation.zh: 弗兰克林去哪儿了？

translation.en: Oh, you know, he's somewhere.
translation.zh: 他去了其他地方…

translation.en: Probably making sure no-one ever wants to be an artist again.
translation.zh: 也许在劝说别人不要当艺术家

translation.en: -You guys didn't work out? -No.
translation.zh: -你们没成？ -是啊

translation.en: No, we didn't. You know, he's not really my type.
translation.zh: 我们没成 他不是我喜欢的类型

translation.en: Turns out I'm more into oblivious,
translation.zh: 我发现我其实对那种当局者迷

translation.en: self-absorbed pricks, you know.
translation.zh: 孤芳自赏的混蛋感兴趣

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, then,
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: would you like to dance?
translation.zh: 你想跳舞吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, I wouldn't.
translation.zh: 我不想

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不想？

translation.en: Because I'm not your backup.
translation.zh: 我不是你的备胎

translation.en: You're home early.
translation.zh: 这么早就回来了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是呀

translation.en: Tonight didn't really go quite as I thought it would.
translation.zh: 今晚… 挺糟糕

translation.en: I'm sorry, kid.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾

translation.en: -You wanna lay it on me? -[switches TV off]
translation.zh: 想跟我说说吗？

translation.en: I've been a stand-in.
translation.zh: 我最近在做替身

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: And what do those two words mean in this context?
translation.zh: 什么叫替身？

translation.en: Well, I started a dating service app.
translation.zh: 我开发了一个约会服务应用

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？ -是的

translation.en: I was the date,
translation.zh: 我做替身…

translation.en: the stand-in.
translation.zh: 参加约会

translation.en: I've raised quite the entrepreneur, huh? I mean, it was more just really...
translation.zh: -我把你培养成为一个创业家 -只是参加一些…

translation.en: school dances, and um...
translation.zh: 学校舞会

translation.en: art show openings. I went to a rodeo. Oh, yeah, the cowboy outfit.
translation.zh: -艺术展开幕式 我去了牛仔竞技比赛 -哦 没错 那套牛仔行头

translation.en: -You saw that? -Sure did, pardner.
translation.zh: -你看到了？ -当然 我们住一起

translation.en: Damn, Brooks, you did all that just to raise money for Yale?
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯 你这样做只是为了攒耶鲁的学费

translation.en: I'd have sold a non-vital organ, if I'd known it meant that much to you.
translation.zh: 要是我知道你这么在意 我会把不致命的器官给卖了

translation.en: There's a reason God gave us two kidneys.
translation.zh: 老天给我们两个肾是有原因的

translation.en: That spare kidney is just a rainy day cash cow, sitting there.
translation.zh: 多出来的一个 以备不急之需

translation.en: It wasn't really just for the money.
translation.zh: 不光是钱的问题

translation.en: I went out on all these dates
translation.zh: 我去的那些约会

translation.en: and pretended to be whatever it was that these girls wanted me to be,
translation.zh: 那些女孩想我是什么人 我就可以装作我是什么人 我也不知道了 我以为…

translation.en: because, I don't know, I thought that...
translation.zh: 我也不知道了 我以为…

translation.en: I thought that maybe I would find out who I am, and Miss Track...
translation.zh: 我以为这样我就能知道我到底是谁

translation.en: quite cruelly pointed out that I have absolutely no idea who I am.
translation.zh: 施特拉克夫人无情地指出 我根本不知道自己是谁

translation.en: Anyway, it didn't work.
translation.zh: 反正我没有成功

translation.en: Yeah, well who the hell knows who they are anyway.
translation.zh: 又有谁明白自己是谁呢？

translation.en: We are all just figuring it out as we go along.
translation.zh: 我们都在摸着石头过河

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的

translation.en: So, the best you can do is
translation.zh: 你能做的就是…

translation.en: reflect on who you were in the past
translation.zh: 拿你过去的样子

translation.en: and compare that to who you wanna be in the future,
translation.zh: 和你希望你未来的样子做比较

translation.en: and you split the difference. That's who you are now.
translation.zh: 找出差别 这差不多就是你的现状

translation.en: Like, I was a success,
translation.zh: 比如我 以前很成功…

translation.en: and I wanna be a success again.
translation.zh: 以后我还想再次成功

translation.en: And I was a good husband,
translation.zh: 以前我是个好丈夫

translation.en: until your mom left us.
translation.zh: 后来你妈妈离开了我们

translation.en: She left me,
translation.zh: 她离开了我…

translation.en: but you know what I didn't fail at? Is being a good dad.
translation.zh: 你知道我哪方面没有失败吗？ 我还是个好父亲…

translation.en: Because of who you turned out to be.
translation.zh: 因为我培养了你

translation.en: I know sometimes you think I gave up and...
translation.zh: 我知道有时候你认为我放弃了…

translation.en: yeah, maybe there's some truth in that.
translation.zh: 也不全错

translation.en: But I never gave up on you.
translation.zh: 但我从来没有放弃过你

translation.en: I love you, bud.
translation.zh: 我爱你 孩子

translation.en: -I love you too, Dad. -I know.
translation.zh: -我也爱你 爸爸 -我知道

translation.en: -I'll be back. -Cool.
translation.zh: 我过去一下

translation.en: Not used to you being alone.
translation.zh: 你怎么会一个人了？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I've successfully pushed everyone else away, so...
translation.zh: 我成功地把其他人都打发了

translation.en: It occurred to me that I never would have been able to get
translation.zh: 我想到 要是没有你

translation.en: the Stand-In off the ground, if it wasn't for you.
translation.zh: 我的替身应用也不会上线

translation.en: And then once I finally got it to take off,
translation.zh: 等到我的应用发布了

translation.en: I shoved you out of the plane, so I am sorry.
translation.zh: 我就把你给甩了 我很抱歉

translation.en: It's not that big a deal, man.
translation.zh: 不是什么大事儿

translation.en: I have an emotional parachute that I've been weaving together,
translation.zh: 这么点情感挫折 我能自行消化

translation.en: every day I've been alive. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我活得挺好

translation.en: But how goes that Yale essay?
translation.zh: 耶鲁的申请信写得怎么样了？

translation.en: It's paused.
translation.zh: 现在不在写

translation.en: I'm not the best judge of my words or my actions right now.
translation.zh: 现在我的说话和做事都有点乱

translation.en: How's tuna melt? He came back to the shop,
translation.zh: -金枪鱼三明治怎么样了？ -他又来店里了

translation.en: so, good, I guess? Or, at the very least, not really bad.
translation.zh: 我想一切还好 至少不是太糟

translation.en: He's not coming in for middle of the road sandwich cuisine.
translation.zh: 他不是来路边小店买三明治的

translation.en: I get it, you're intimidated,
translation.zh: 我明白了 你害怕了

translation.en: he's taller, he's stronger, he's obviously better looking than you.
translation.zh: 他更高更壮 他绝对比你帅多了

translation.en: But you are the smart one, so you have got to make the first move.
translation.zh: 但你有脑子 你得主动

translation.en: So, I guess, let's both do better at what we have to do.
translation.zh: 那我们一起把我们该做的事做好吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -All right. -All right.
translation.zh: -行 -行

translation.en: Watch this.
translation.zh: 看着

translation.en: Hey, Rattigan, dude, I heard what happened with you and my cousin,
translation.zh: 嘿 拉蒂根 哥们儿 我听说了你和我表妹的事儿

translation.en: and if it makes you feel any better,
translation.zh: 如果这个周末我把车借给你

translation.en: I'll let you take my car for the weekend.
translation.zh: 你会不会心情好一点？

translation.en: -No, I'm good. -Just kidding, I'm not...
translation.zh: -不用了 -我只是开玩笑的 我不会…

translation.en: -What? -I said, "I'm good." Thanks though, Reece.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我说不用了 谢谢 里斯

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的

translation.en: It's just a car.
translation.zh: 只不过是一辆车

translation.en: Look, if you ever need someone to talk to, I'm here.
translation.zh: 听着 如果你想找人说说 你可以找我

translation.en: Okay, I know it can be rough when your parents go through a divorce.
translation.zh: 我知道你爸妈正在闹离婚 这段时间你很困难

translation.en: It makes you act differently, so....
translation.zh: 所以你行为有点异常

translation.en: Uh, what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Hey, Celia.
translation.zh: 嘿 西利亚

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Thank you for saying yes to this.
translation.zh: 谢谢你答应了

translation.en: Can I get you something, a coffee, or... ?
translation.zh: 我请你喝点什么 咖啡 好吗？

translation.en: I don't know, I have a Pour Over.
translation.zh: 我来了一杯滴漏式咖啡

translation.en: Franklin was right, they're kind of divine.
translation.zh: 弗兰克林说得还真不错 口味很好

translation.en: Oh, God, no. No, thank you.
translation.zh: 天呐 不了 谢谢你

translation.en: So, how have you been?
translation.zh: 你最近怎么样？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I'm good. I'm really good.
translation.zh: 我真的很好

translation.en: That's good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Well, I killed the app.
translation.zh: 我把应用关闭了

translation.en: Oh, that right?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, in the spirit of honesty, which is kind of my new thing,
translation.zh: 诚实的精神对我来说是个新事物

translation.en: I haven't quite been able to bring myself to delete it,
translation.zh: 我现在还没有把应用删掉

translation.en: but I have denied all the requests that are coming in.
translation.zh: 但所有任务我都拒绝了

translation.en: And the women of the world weep.
translation.zh: 天下的女人岂不伤心死了

translation.en: Not really. There's a couple of copycat apps that have popped up.
translation.zh: 不至于 现在出现了一些模仿我的应用

translation.en: The market is getting saturated. I got out of the game at a good time.
translation.zh: 市场越来越饱和了 现在是时候退出了

translation.en: -Good. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 很好 是啊

translation.en: -It's nice to see you. I miss you. -Brooks.
translation.zh: -见到你真好 我很想你 -布鲁克斯

translation.en: Please, just don't, okay?
translation.zh: 别说这些 行吗？

translation.en: Hey, am I gonna read the admissions letter or what?
translation.zh: 还要我帮你读入学申请信吗？

translation.en: Yes, sorry.
translation.zh: 要的 抱歉

translation.en: I hope you didn't waste too much time on it,
translation.zh: 我希望你没有浪费太多时间

translation.en: because based on your meeting with the Dean,
translation.zh: 从你和招生主任的会面来看

translation.en: you could have drawn a picture of a bee and gotten in.
translation.zh: 你画幅蜜蜂 就能进大学了

translation.en: I actually didn't apply to Yale.
translation.zh: 我没有申请耶鲁大学

translation.en: -Wait, what? -Yeah, I accepted UCONN's offer.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我接受了康大提供的入学机会

translation.en: Hold on, I thought Yale was everything to you.
translation.zh: 等一下 我以为… -耶鲁大学对你很重要 -以前是

translation.en: It was.
translation.zh: -耶鲁大学对你很重要 -以前是

translation.en: It was and then I realized
translation.zh: 后来我意识到

translation.en: that if I have to pretend to be someone else to get in,
translation.zh: 如果我得装成另一个人才能进耶鲁

translation.en: then I probably don't belong there.
translation.zh: 那我也许不属于那儿

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: Brooks, what is this?
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯 这是什么？

translation.en: [Brooks] Dear Admissions Office of the University of Celia Lieberman,
translation.zh: 亲爱的西利亚·利伯曼大学招生主任

translation.en: First off, I just want to say what an honor it is
translation.zh: 首先 我感到很荣幸

translation.en: just to be considered as a potential attendee at your fine institution.
translation.zh: 能作为贵校考虑的潜在候选人

translation.en: And secondly, this feels really creepy writing to you
translation.zh: 其次 管你作为一个大学给你写信

translation.en: as if you're a university and not a person, so I'll stop that now.
translation.zh: 而不把你当成一个人 这很怪异 所以我现在要改过来

translation.en: A few months ago, I was a guy who carried around this empty feeling.
translation.zh: 几个月前 我感觉很空虚

translation.en: Then, I thought that it could be filled by
translation.zh: 我想我可以通过

translation.en: driving the nicest car,
translation.zh: 开好车…

translation.en: dating the most popular girl, or going to the fanciest school.
translation.zh: 找校花做女朋友 上好学校来填补这种空虚

translation.en: But the closer I got to having any of these things,
translation.zh: 我越接近实现这些愿望

translation.en: the deeper that empty feeling got.
translation.zh: 我越感觉空虚

translation.en: I've been so many people these past few months.
translation.zh: 过去的几个月 我扮演了很多人

translation.en: A cowboy, an art connoisseur, an amateur beekeeper,
translation.zh: 牛仔、艺术收藏家、业余养蜂人

translation.en: a prep school wannabe, a bad friend,
translation.zh: 一个预备学校的崇拜模仿者 一个差劲的朋友

translation.en: an obnoxious son and a self-obsessed prick.
translation.zh: 一个讨厌的儿子和一个自恋的混蛋

translation.en: But through it all there were little pockets of air
translation.zh: 但在这期间 有一点点时间让我觉得

translation.en: when I felt like I was truly myself,
translation.zh: 我是真实的自己…

translation.en: and that was when I was with you.
translation.zh: 那就是和你在一起的时候

translation.en: I don't know if you're accepting applications right now,
translation.zh: 我不知道你现在是否接受申请

translation.en: but if not, I am totally willing to be wait-listed.
translation.zh: 如果不接受 我很愿意在你的等待名单上

translation.en: [Dad] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I was gonna cook a steak, do you want one?
translation.zh: 我打算做牛排 你要吗？

translation.en: -No, thanks. -Are you sure?
translation.zh: -不了 谢谢 -你确定吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm good. -All right.
translation.zh: -是的 -好吧

translation.en: [Brooks] Hey...
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: you actually got some mail. I put it on the table.
translation.zh: 有你的信 我放在桌子上了

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 哦 天呐

translation.en: Just what I need. It's probably another rejection letter.
translation.zh: 我正需要呢 可能又是拒绝信

translation.en: This is...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: It must be one of the grants I applied for,
translation.zh: 这一定是我为富有远见写作奖

translation.en: the Visionary Writing Award.
translation.zh: 申请的拨款

translation.en: Dear Mr. Rattigan, in recognition of your unparalleled literary talent,
translation.zh: ”亲爱的拉蒂根先生 出于对你无与伦比的写作天赋的赏识

translation.en: we would like to offer you this grant to further your career as a visionary writer.
translation.zh: 我们向你提供这项资金 帮助你在富有远见的作家的事业上 走得更远”

translation.en: -That's incredible, Dad. -Yeah! That's how we do it!
translation.zh: -这太棒了 爸爸 -耶！这才像个样！

translation.en: Steak night. Boom!
translation.zh: 今晚吃牛排！

translation.en: I shouldn't have slapped you.
translation.zh: 我不应该打你耳光

translation.en: I mean, it felt great for me,
translation.zh: 打你的感觉… 很不错…

translation.en: but I shouldn't have slapped you.
translation.zh: 但我不应该打你耳光

translation.en: -No, I think I deserved it. -Yeah, you did.
translation.zh: 不 我想… -我是自找的 -没错！

translation.en: And, you know, I'd do it again.
translation.zh: 我还会打你的

translation.en: But I'd really like to not have to.
translation.zh: 最好不要给我这个机会

translation.en: So, are you ready to go?
translation.zh: 你可以走了吗？

translation.en: Go where?
translation.zh: 去哪儿？

translation.en: Our date. I'm taking you to the formal.
translation.zh: 我们的约会 我要带你去正装舞会

translation.en: Another formal? How expensive are horse stables?
translation.zh: 又有正装舞会？ 你们的马厩得花多少钱？

translation.en: It's just a shed over an animal.
translation.zh: 只是给动物遮风挡雨的地方

translation.en: No, I'm not going to another formal for as long as I live.
translation.zh: 我这辈子也不会去参加正装舞会了

translation.en: Come on, I'm not taking no for an answer and you know how stubborn I can be.
translation.zh: 拜托 你无法拒绝的 你知道我有多固执

translation.en: I do know that.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: -Fine. -Good answer.
translation.zh: -好吧 -这个答案不错

translation.en: But wait, you left literally all the fields blank on the app, so
translation.zh: 但你的资料上什么都没有

translation.en: what kind of personality would you like for your date?
translation.zh: 你需要什么样性格的人和你约会？

translation.en: There were so many good ones.
translation.zh: 有很多好的性格

translation.en: But I think I'm gonna go with regular old
translation.zh: 但我会选普通、老式

translation.en: no-frills, vanilla ice cream Brooks Rattigan.
translation.zh: 无装饰的 香草冰激凌的布鲁克斯·拉蒂根

translation.en: I think I can make that happen.
translation.zh: 这我能行

translation.en: [Celia] Thanks, I got that.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我来吧

translation.en: -Nice of you to dress up. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你穿得还不错 -是啊

translation.en: I just... I do what she tells me to do.
translation.zh: 这些都是她叫我做的

translation.en: [man] Hey, what's up?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: Murph.
translation.zh: 墨菲

translation.en: -This is incredible. -I know.
translation.zh: -这太棒了！ -我知道

translation.en: I can't take all the credit, the whole thing was Celia's idea,
translation.zh: 我不能居功 这都是西利亚的主意

translation.en: and tuna melt is a whiz with décor.
translation.zh: 金枪鱼三明治是个装饰天才

translation.en: What's his real name?
translation.zh: 他的真名是什么？

translation.en: Oh, my God, you don't know.
translation.zh: 天呐 你不知道

translation.en: How do you not know his name?
translation.zh: 你怎么会不知道他的名字？

translation.en: I keep hoping it will come up naturally and it never does.
translation.zh: 我希望一切顺其自然 但从来没有机会 现在我也不能问他 我很有深度的

translation.en: And I can't ask him now, I'm in too deep.
translation.zh: 但从来没有机会 现在我也不能问他 我很有深度的

translation.en: Look, I know it's early, but if you're in need of a roommate next year...
translation.zh: 我知道现在提这事儿太早 如果明年你需要一个室友…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Wait, you're going to UCONN? -I am.
translation.zh: -等等 你被康大录取了？ -是的

translation.en: I didn't think they'd accept me, considering my GPA is a bit iffy,
translation.zh: 凭我的成绩 他们不会录取我

translation.en: but I showed them some of my apps, and they were impressed.
translation.zh: 但我给他们看了我的些应用 他们对我刮目相看

translation.en: Who told you the Stand-In would be good for both of us?
translation.zh: 是谁告诉你 替身软件会对我们俩都有好处？

translation.en: Not the Stand-In, they hated it.
translation.zh: 不是替身 他们不喜欢

translation.en: -What? -They hated it.
translation.zh: -怎么？ -他们恨替身

translation.en: They liked MyTraxx,
translation.zh: 他们喜欢“成功之路”

translation.en: and I tweaked it to be applicable for student loans.
translation.zh: 我稍微调整了一下 这个应用可以用在申请学生贷款上

translation.en: You know, which makes me a genius.
translation.zh: 你知道… 这让我看起来像个天才

translation.en: -Congratulations, man. -Hey, Murph, help me with this table.
translation.zh: -祝贺你 哥们儿 -嘿 墨菲 帮我搭个手

translation.en: Got it, uh...
translation.zh: 好的…

translation.en: man.
translation.zh: 哥们儿

translation.en: Hey, I can bear this wait no longer, you've gotta tell me.
translation.zh: 嘿 我等不急了 你得告诉我…

translation.en: Did I get in?
translation.zh: 我有没有被录取？

translation.en: It was a tough call.
translation.zh: 这是个难做的决定

translation.en: I mean, your essay was littered with sentence fragments and run-ons,
translation.zh: 你的申请书上都是句子片段 和不合语法的长句子

translation.en: like, seriously, but,
translation.zh: 我是说真的…

translation.en: after careful consideration,
translation.zh: 但经过慎重考虑

translation.en: the Admissions Board of the University of Celia Lieberman
translation.zh: 西利亚·利伯曼大学的招生委员会

translation.en: is pleased to inform you that, yes, you are accepted.
translation.zh: 很愉快地通知你 你被录取了

translation.en: -Come on! -Hey, don't get too excited.
translation.zh: -太好了！ -嘿 别太兴奋

translation.en: You are on a probationary basis, okay? Like, one semester at a time.
translation.zh: 对你的录取是临时的 每个学期结束都要重新评估

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'll take what I can get.
translation.zh: 那也行

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you gonna do to celebrate this acceptance?
translation.zh: 你被录取了 你打算怎么庆祝？

translation.en: There are a few things that I'd like to do.
translation.zh: 有几件事我想做

translation.en: Oh, inform me. What?
translation.zh: 快告诉我

translation.en: Well, one,
translation.zh: 第一…

translation.en: I really wanna do this.
translation.zh: 我想做这个

translation.en: And two,
translation.zh: 第二…

translation.en: I wanna do that again.
translation.zh: 我想再来一次

translation.en: And three,
translation.zh: 第三…

translation.en: I want to dance.
translation.zh: 我想跳舞

translation.en: Oh, you think you can keep up with me?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能跟上我吗？

translation.en: Well, I'd like to try.
translation.zh: 我很乐意试试

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: Yes, Murph.
translation.zh: 墨菲 很好

translation.en: Hello, Celia. ♪ I can wear the clothes Of the characters of films that I see ♪
translation.zh: 西利亚 跳起来

translation.en: ♪ Just forget her ♪♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：张王华
